content.rendered:
Join us on Handshake!

Handshake provides industry partners the opportunity to directly recruit students, review applications, post-employment, internship and research opportunities; and will serve as your entry point to partnership. Handshake allows the Career Center the opportunity to connect directly with you for marquee events, on- campus recruitment, and creates a brand presence at University of La Verne campus.  We invite you to engage, recruit and visit our campus via Handshake today!

If interested, this link will automatically request your employer approval at the University of La Verne.
